code:
def test_getsetdel_attr(self):

        class X(object):
            a = 1
            b = 2
            c = 3

            def __dir__(self):
                return ['a', 'b', 'c']

        v = X()

        x = Proxy(lambda: v)
        self.assertListEqual(x.__members__, ['a', 'b', 'c'])
        self.assertEqual(x.a, 1)
        self.assertEqual(x.b, 2)
        self.assertEqual(x.c, 3)

        setattr(x, 'a', 10)
        self.assertEqual(x.a, 10)

        del(x.a)
        self.assertEqual(x.a, 1)

smell.description: The attribute is deleted from an object through a dynamically determined name.
